item.title: 消息人士称，日本 TDK 收购美国智能眼镜公司 SoftEye
item.description: 一位熟悉内情的人士透露，日本 TDK 公司已经收购了美国的 SoftEye 公司，该公司为智能眼镜制造软件和硬件。【原文：Japan's TDK has acquired U.S.-based SoftEye, which makes software and hardware for smart glasses, said a person familiar with the matter, as the smartphone battery maker looks for growth drivers linked to artificial intelligence.】

item.title: 瑞士国家银行在稳定报告中指出贸易和紧张局势带来的不确定性
item.description: 瑞士国家银行周四表示，经济和金融前景高度不确定，特别是由于贸易和地缘政治紧张局势，不过该行指出，在瑞银集团的推动下，瑞士银行的盈利能力在 2024 年有所改善。【原文：The Swiss National Bank said on Thursday the economic and financial outlook is highly uncertain, particularly due to trade and geopolitical tensions, though it noted profitability for Swiss banks improved in 2024, driven by UBS.】

item.title: 早间竞价：地缘政治、利率决定令市场保持谨慎
item.description: Johann M Cherian 展望欧洲和全球市场的未来一天【原文：A look at the day ahead in European and global markets from Johann M Cherian】

item.title: 洞察：世界顶级广告公司如何在印度联合操纵价格
item.description: 宏盟媒体的印度负责人感到非常沮丧。这一天是 2023 年 10 月 5 日，就在全球广告公司和广播公司就南亚国家的广告价格达成秘密协议几周后，一家竞争对手正试图以更低的价格挖走这家美国公司的客户。【原文：Omnicom Media's India chief was frustrated. It was October 5, 2023 and a rival was trying to poach the U.S. firm's client by offering lower prices, just weeks after global advertising agencies and broadcasters struck secret pacts on ad rates in the South Asian country.】

item.title: 中国的 618 延长购物节未能掀起热潮
item.description: 中国最大的年中购物节 "618 "在经过一个多月旨在吸引消费者拿出更多血汗钱的促销活动后，于周三晚间无声无息地落下帷幕。【原文：China's biggest mid-year shopping festival, 618, ended on Wednesday evening without much fanfare after more than a month of promotional events aimed at enticing consumers to part with more of their hard-earned money.】

item.title: 马来西亚地方法院下令禁止 Telegram 传播有害内容
item.description: 马来西亚通信监管机构周四表示，它已获得一项临时法院命令，针对涉嫌传播违反该国法律内容的消息服务 Telegram 和该平台上的两个频道。【原文：Malaysia's communications regulator said on Thursday it has obtained a temporary court order against messaging service Telegram and two channels on the platform for allegedly disseminating content that violates the country's law.】

item.title: 德克萨斯州民主党议员要求特斯拉推迟推出机器人出租车
item.description: 德克萨斯州的一群民主党议员要求特斯拉将其在奥斯汀推出的备受期待的机器人出租车推迟到 9 月份，因为届时新的自动驾驶法律将生效。【原文：A group of Democratic Texas lawmakers has asked Tesla to delay its much-anticipated robotaxi launch in Austin until September, when a new autonomous-driving law is scheduled to take effect.】

item.title: 独家报道草案显示，日本计划将超长期债券销售削减10%，以缓解市场担忧
item.description: 路透社（Reuters）看到的一份文件草案显示，日本政府计划罕见地修改本财年的债券计划，将超长期债券的销售额从原计划中削减约 10%，从而减少整体债券发行量。【原文：Japan's government plans to cut sales of super-long bonds by about 10% from the original plan in a rare revision to its bond programme for the current fiscal year, trimming overall bond issuance as a result, a draft document seen by Reuters showed.】

item.title: 澳大利亚青少年社交媒体禁令面临新的挑战：青少年
item.description: 当 13 岁的茉莉-埃尔金（Jasmine Elkin）试用澳大利亚可能用来禁止儿童和青少年使用社交媒体的年龄检查软件时，她惊讶地发现有些产品可以精确到月地识别一个人的年龄，但她仍然怀疑这种方法是否有效。【原文：When 13-year-old Jasmine Elkin tried out the age-checking software Australia might use to ban children and teenagers from social media, she was surprised some products could identify a person's age to the month - but she still doubts it will work.】

item.title: 前顶级经济学家称，日本央行黯淡的预测表明今年不会加息
item.description: 日本央行前首席经济学家龟田诚作（Seisaku Kameda）表示，日本央行今年很可能暂缓加息，除非美国关税出现戏剧性的积极变化，使其能够彻底改变5月份做出的悲观预测。【原文：The Bank of Japan is likely to hold off raising interest rates this year unless a dramatic, positive turn of events in U.S. tariffs allows it to overhaul gloomy projections made in May, its former top economist Seisaku Kameda said.】

item.title: 壳牌首席执行官表示，壳牌在中东航运方面 "非常谨慎
item.description: 壳牌石油公司首席执行官瓦埃勒-萨万（Wael Sawan）周四表示，鉴于以色列和伊朗之间的冲突不断升级，壳牌石油公司在中东地区的航运方面 "非常谨慎"。【原文：Shell CEO Wael Sawan said on Thursday the oil and gas major was being "very careful" with its shipping through the Middle East given the escalating conflict between Israel and Iran.】

item.title: 澳大利亚 5 月份就业岗位意外减少，但失业率保持稳定
item.description: 周四的数据显示，澳大利亚的就业率在上个月稳健增长后于五月份出现下滑，尽管全职工作岗位跳升，失业率保持稳定，这表明劳动力市场继续保持韧性。【原文：Australian employment dipped in May after solid gains the previous month, data showed on Thursday, though full-time jobs jumped and the jobless rate held steady in a sign of continued resilience in the labour market.】

item.title: 鲍威尔强调通胀风险，美元持稳；中东忧虑升温
item.description: 美元周四持稳，投资者权衡了美联储主席杰罗姆-鲍威尔（Jerome Powell）对通胀的谨慎基调，而中东更广泛冲突的威胁和美国可能卷入其中的可能性使市场情绪脆弱。【原文：The dollar held steady on Thursday, as investors weighed Federal Reserve Chair Jerome Powell's cautionary tone on inflation, while the looming threat of a broader conflict in the Middle East and possible U.S. involvement left sentiment frail.】

item.title: 中东冲突不断，亚洲股市下滑，黄金随日元上涨
item.description: 周四，亚洲股市走低，而黄金和日元等避险资产则上涨，因为投资者对美国可能加入持续一周的以色列-伊朗空战仍心有余悸。【原文：Stock markets in Asia edged lower on Thursday while safe havens such as gold and the Japanese yen gained as investors remained on edge over the possible entry of the United States into the week-old Israel-Iran air war.】

item.title: 尽管面临竞争困境，东南亚廉价航空公司仍将赌注押在旅游需求上
item.description: 东南亚最大的廉价航空公司正在进行一场激烈的运力扩张竞赛，尽管成本压力不断上升，挤压了盈利能力，并导致澳航关闭了总部位于新加坡的捷星亚洲航空公司（Jetstar Asia）。【原文：Southeast Asia's biggest budget airlines are pursuing a bruising capacity expansion race despite rising cost pressures that are squeezing profitability and led Qantas Airways to shut down Singapore-based offshoot Jetstar Asia.】

item.title: 新日铁首席执行官淡化美国黄金股给管理层自由带来的风险
item.description: 与特朗普政府签署的国家安全协议赋予了政府非经济的黄金股份，并授权总统任命一名董事会成员。【原文：The national security agreement inked with the Trump administration hands the government a non-economic golden share and gives the president the authority to name a board member.】

item.title: 投资者权衡美国干预伊朗-以色列冲突的可能性，石油价格下跌
item.description: 在美国总统唐纳德-特朗普就该国可能卷入以色列-伊朗冲突的问题发出喜忧参半的信号后，投资者迟迟不愿建立新的头寸，导致油价周四下滑。【原文：Oil prices slipped on Thursday as investors hesitated to take new positions after U.S. President Donald Trump gave mixed signals on the country's potential involvement in the ongoing Israel-Iran conflict.】

item.title: 美联储谨慎行事，令市场对关税风险忧心忡忡
item.description: 美联储的谨慎态度打消了降息的希望，使得投资者在应对地缘政治紧张局势、通胀风险以及美国总统唐纳德-特朗普的关税对经济增长的拖累时惶惶不可终日。【原文：A cautious Federal Reserve has put a damper on hopes for interest rate cuts, leaving investors on edge as they navigate a murky mix of geopolitical tensions, inflation risks, and looming growth drag from U.S. President Donald Trump's tariffs.】

item.title: 面对关税，钢铁制造商钛镁推动加强 USMCA 贸易协定
item.description: 尽管目前面临美国总统唐纳德-特朗普（Donald Trump）政府征收钢铁关税的阻力，但在墨西哥拥有大量业务的钢铁制造商 Ternium 周三表示，在即将进行的审查之前，希望地区贸易协议的条款更加强硬。【原文：Ternium , a steelmaker with a massive Mexico business, on Wednesday pushed for stronger terms of a regional trade agreement ahead of a pending review, despite current headwinds from steel tariffs imposed by the government of U.S. President Donald Trump.】

item.title: 技术高管：苹果公司希望使用人工智能设计芯片
item.description: 苹果公司硬件技术高管在上个月的私人谈话中表示，苹果公司有兴趣利用生成式人工智能来帮助加快其设备核心定制芯片的设计。【原文：Apple is interested in tapping generative artificial intelligence to help speed up the design of the custom chips at the heart of its devices, its top hardware technology executive said in private remarks last month.】

item.title: 路透社调查显示，超过 70% 的日本企业认为关税影响在预期之内
item.description: 路透社周四的一项调查显示，绝大多数日本企业认为美国总统唐纳德-特朗普的关税对企业的影响在预期之内，没有必要改变投资计划。【原文：A significant majority of Japanese firms have found the business impact of U.S. President Donald Trump's tariffs within expectations and have not found it necessary to change investment plans, a Reuters survey showed on Thursday.】

item.title: 美联储鲍威尔称央行仍有开展工作所需的数据
item.description: 美联储主席杰罗姆-鲍威尔（Jerome Powell）周三呼吁政府不要过于激进地削减收集经济数据的工作，因为收集到的信息对整个国家都大有裨益。【原文：Federal Reserve Chair Jerome Powell made a plea on Wednesday for the government not to cut back too aggressively on its efforts to collect data on the economy because the information it collects strongly benefits the entire nation.】

item.title: 报告称，糟糕的电网规划可能改变欧洲数据中心的地理位置
item.description: 能源智囊团 Ember 周四发布的一份报告显示，欧洲主要的数据中心枢纽将面临重大转变，因为除非电网规划更加积极主动，否则开发商会选择连接时间最短的地方。【原文：Europe's leading data centre hubs face a major shift as developers will go wherever connection times are shortest, unless there is more proactive electricity grid planning, a report on Thursday by energy think-tank Ember showed.】

item.title: 据 The Information 报道，Meta 正在洽谈聘请 GitHub 前首席执行官 Nat Friedman 加入人工智能工作
item.description: 据 The Information 周三援引知情人士的话报道，Meta Platforms 正在洽谈聘请 GitHub 前首席执行官纳特-弗里德曼（Nat Friedman）加入 Facebook 母公司的人工智能部门。【原文：Meta Platforms is in talks to hire former GitHub CEO Nat Friedman to join the Facebook parent's AI efforts, The Information reported on Wednesday, citing a person familiar with the matter.】

item.title: 力拓就蒙古矿山问题达成 1.3875 亿美元和解协议
item.description: 法庭记录显示，力拓同意支付 1.3875 亿美元，以了结指控这家英澳矿业巨头未披露其耗资 70 亿美元的蒙古奥尤陶勒盖铜金矿地下扩建工程存在的问题，从而欺诈投资者的诉讼。【原文：Rio Tinto , agreed to pay $138.75 million to settle a lawsuit accusing the Anglo-Australian mining giant of defrauding investors by failing to disclose problems with its $7 billion underground expansion of the Oyu Tolgoi copper and gold mine in Mongolia, according to court records.】

item.title: 交易日 市场在飓风眼中保持平静
item.description: 交易日【原文：TRADING DAY】

item.title: 匈牙利与美国商讨应对关税影响的商业协议
item.description: 一位匈牙利官员周三表示，匈牙利和美国正在讨论一项可能涉及太空产业和军事能力合作的商业交易，旨在抵消美国潜在关税的影响。【原文：Hungary and the United States are discussing a business deal that could involve cooperation in the space industry and military capabilities, a Hungarian official said on Wednesday, aiming to offset the impacts of potential U.S. tariffs.】

item.title: 监管机构的美国银行杠杆减免计划可能令美国国债市场大跌眼镜
item.description: 如果美国监管机构选择放宽资本要求，而不是将美国政府债券排除在杠杆率计算之外，那么希望银行杠杆率规则发生期待已久转变的美国国债市场参与者可能会失望。【原文：U.S. Treasury market participants hoping for a long-awaited shift in bank leverage rules may be in for a letdown if U.S. regulators choose to ease capital requirements rather than exclude U.S. government bonds from leverage calculations.】

item.title: 如果美国加入以伊冲突，投资者将看到股市迅速下跌
item.description: 经济学家警告说，如果美国军队攻击伊朗，金融市场可能会出现 "膝跳式 "抛售，油价的大幅上涨可能会损害已经因唐纳德-特朗普总统的关税而捉襟见肘的全球经济。【原文：Financial markets may be in for a "knee-jerk" selloff if the U.S. military attacks Iran, with economists warning that a dramatic rise in oil prices could damage a global economy already strained by President Donald Trump's tariffs.】

item.title: 天西航空与立陶宛在巴黎航展上达成交易，提升巴西航空工业公司的地位
item.description: 投资者和分析师周三对巴西飞机制造商巴西航空工业公司在巴黎航展上宣布的新交易表示欢迎，其中包括天西航空（SkyWest）的大型支线喷气机订单以及与立陶宛达成的防务协议。【原文：Investors and analysts on Wednesday welcomed fresh deals announced by Brazilian planemaker Embraer at the Paris Airshow, including a major regional jet order from SkyWest and a defense agreement with Lithuania.】
